parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Time

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns system time.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[systemTime]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format [year, month, day, hour, minute, second, millisecond]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_currentTime = [[systemTime]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[systemTimeUTC]], [[date]], [[time]], [[daytime]], [[diag_tickTime]], [[serverTime]], [[missionStart]], [[diag_deltaTime]]
</value></part></template>
